mapper.select: select m.menu_id menuId, m.menu_name menuName, m.menu_level menuLevel, m.parent_id parentId, m.menu_path menuPath, m.menu_order menuOrder, m.note, m.icon from sys_role_menu rm join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id=m.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.status=1 order by m.menu_level,m.menu_order

END WHERE menu_id IN
